info.description: This is the API documentation for Base Framework
info.title: Base Framework API

post.description: Request to reset password
Login user
Logout user
Register user
Reset user password using token
Checks if a user has permission to perform an action on a resource

get.description: Get all permissions in the system

post.description: Creates a resource-specific permission override

get.description: Get all roles in the system

post.description: Creates a new role with the provided information

get.description: Retrieves a specific role by its Id

put.description: Updates an existing role with the provided information

delete.description: Deletes a role by its Id

get.description: Retrieves all permissions associated with a specific role

put.description: Replaces all permissions for a role with the provided list
put.summary: Update all permissions for a role

parameters.description: List of permission IDs to assign
parameters.name: permissions

post.description: Assigns a permission to a role

delete.description: Removes a permission from a role
